issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I am a Appcelerator Platform indie user. When I am trying to login through appcelerator studio, I am not receiving code via email. it's not in spam inbox. (platform web has same problem)
fields.environment:
appcelerator studio 4.0 beta
xcode 6.0
node 0.10.26
titanium sdk 3.5.1

comments.body: Thank you for submitting your ticket regarding your activation email. Weâ€™re currently batch activating users in the order they signed up. You should receive your activation email soon. Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist with.
